Header: Popular singer Ronnie Leitch has passed away
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ Popular Singer and comedian Ronnie Leitch (65) passed away this morning (October 01) due to a sudden heart attack in Perth, Australia. Chairman of the Sri Lanka Singers Association, Keerthi Pasquel confirmed that the singer had passed away while attending a show held at Perth. Having gained fame for singing over 350 songs, Ronnie Leitch had contributed greatly to the music industry of Sri Lanka.
